mapper.select: select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select * from (select re.rid,re.rordernum,re.ramount,re.rcheckin,re.rcheckout,re.rresname,re.rresphone,re.rresemail, re.rexbreaknum,re.rexbed,re.rexperson,re.rcancel,re.mid,re.riid,ri.riroomtype,ri.rimainimg, py.pmethod,py.pdate,py.ptotal,py.prefund from reservation re,room_info ri, payment py where re.riid=ri.riid and re.rid=py.rid and re.mid=#{mid} and re.rcheckin < sysdate) a left outer join review re on a.rid=re.rid order by a.rid desc)aa ) where rnum>=#{startRowNum} and rnum<=#{endRowNum}
select * from reservation re,room_info ri, payment py where re.riid=ri.riid and re.rid=py.rid and re.mid=#{mid} and re.rcheckin >= sysdate
select count(*) cnt from reservation re,room_info ri, payment py where re.riid=ri.riid and re.rid=py.rid and re.mid=#{mid} and re.rcheckin < sysdate
